greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominators of the convergents of the continued fraction for Catalan's constant L(2, chi4), where L(s, chi4) is the Dirichlet L-function for the non-principal character modulo 4.
formula: chi4(k) = Kronecker(-4, k); chi4(k) is 0, 1, 0, -1 when k reduced modulo 4 is 0, 1, 2, 3, respectively; chi4 is A101455.
mathematica: nmax = 100; cfrac = ContinuedFraction[Catalan, nmax + 1]; Join[ {1, 0}, Denominator[ Table[ FromContinuedFraction[ Take[cfrac, j] ], {j, 1, nmax + 1} ] ] ]
results.author: _Stuart Clary_, Dec 17 2008
